title: Get this Ryzen 7 mini PC with 32GB RAM for a new low price: $339
description: With this special Amazon deal, this mini PC with solid specs (and triple 4K support) is now cheaper than ever.
content:
If you’re strapped for cash, the best bang for your buck these days is to get a reputable mini PC instead of a budget laptop or desktop PC. Today’s mini PCs are tiny, powerful, and affordable—like this Beelink SER5 Max that’s only $339 on Amazon (was $449) with Prime. Don’t have Prime? Grab a free 30-day trial and score this price now!

This thing may be so tiny that you forget it’s even hiding under (or behind) your monitor, but it’s also powerful enough to handle your daily workload without breaking a sweat. It packs an AMD Ryzen 7 6800U processor, 32GB of LPDDR5 RAM, and a speedy 1TB SSD, which is more solid than anything you’ll find on a comparably priced laptop.

Between its HDMI 2.0, DisplayPort 1.4, and USB-C video ports, you’ll be able to run up to three 4K@60Hz monitors with this mini PC. (When used solo, the DisplayPort and USB-C can even support refresh rates up to 144Hz and 120Hz, respectively.) You also get two USB-A 3.2, two USB-A 2.0, a Gigabit LAN, and a 3.5mm audio jack, plus Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2 support. It’s truly ready to power your home workstation!

This is a fantastic mini PC for just $339, so hurry and get your order in quick because deals like this don’t last forever. Just remember that this exclusive discount requires an Amazon Prime subscription, so if you haven’t signed up yet, start your 30-day free trial.

Save 24% on this Ryzen 7 mini PC with a chunky 32GB of RAM
summary: The Beelink SER5 Max, a mini PC that packs an AMD Ryzen 7 6800U processor, 32GB of LPDDR5 RAM, and a speedy 1TB SSD, is priced at $339. This discount requires an Amazon Prime subscription, so start your free 30-day trial. The mini PC can power up to three 4K@60Hz monitors and can also be used as a home workstation.
shortSummary: The Beelink SER5 Max Max offers an AMD Ryzen 7 mini PC with 32GB RAM for $339, offering excellent quality and affordable options, requiring Amazon Prime subscription.

About this item
- 【Powerful AMD Ryzen 7 6800U】Beelink SER5 MAX is powered by AMD Ryzen 7 6800U (8 cores 16 threads, 2.7GHz - 4.7GHz, 16M Cache), using the Zen 3+ architecture, processing performance is 18% increased compared to Ryzen 7 5700U. This mini PC integrated with AMD Radeon 680M 12 core 2200 MHz graphics, ideal for office work, editing high-resolution videos and images, multimedia playback with KODI or IPTV up to 4K and light gaming. Gaming Recommendation: CSGO, Destiny2, GTA5, PUBG, DOTA 2, LOL
- 【32GB LPDDR5 & 1TB PCIe4.0 SSD 】SER5 MAX mini pc comes with 32GB LPDDR5 5200MHz RAM & 1TB M.2 2280 PCIe4.0x4 SSD (two SSD slots, max 4TB * 2, speed up to 7000MB/S, 2 times faster than PCIe 3.0). Large capacity helps to save more large programs in the computer and brings smoother operation of multi-tasking. High-speed SSD enables quicker load time of large files and high resolution content
- 【4K UHDTriple Display】SER5 MAX mini desktop computer supports triple screen display via 1*HDMI2.0 (max 4K 60Hz)+1*DP1.4 (max 4K 144Hz)+1*Type-C (max 4K 120Hz), which enables multi-task easily. You can also expand your viewing area across three monitors to enjoy better gaming experience
- 【Reliable & High-speed Connectivity】 Beelink Ryzen 7 mini pc features WiFi 6 (Intel AX200) and Bluetooth 5.2. WiFi 6 is up to 2.4 Gbps transmission speed, three times faster than WiFi5. Lower latency Bluetooth 5.2 offers more stable and efficient connections to multiple wireless devices such as projector, printer, speakers and etc. The mini pc is perfect for video conference, browsing, streaming, large file transfers, and online collaboration
- 【Meet Deeply Needs】6800U mini pc measures 4.9x4.4x1.6 inches, only 1/40th size of standard desktop pc, it's convenient to bring it for flexible working or hide it on the back of a monitor via the VESA mount. 2* USB3.2 and 1 * Type-C ports support data transmission up to 10Gbps, enabling transfer files in seconds. Beelink pc supports Wake On LAN and Auto Power On, a great to use as a server for media (Plex or FTP)

Customer reviews
Customer Reviews, including Product Star Ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them.
To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness.
Learn more how customers reviews work on AmazonCustomers say
Customers find the mini PC works surprisingly fast and is powerful, with one noting it outperforms a full-size tower computer running Win10. The device is compact for small working spaces, easy to set up, and offers great value for money. Customers praise its graphics quality and functionality, with one mentioning it works well with multiple VMs. Customers disagree on the noise level, with some finding it quiet while others note the fans are noisy.

Reviews with images
Handles All Productivity Software We Throw at it
Top reviews from the United States
There was a problem filtering reviews. Please reload the page.
- Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2025Size: 5825U 16G/500GVerified PurchaseFirst of all, thank you Beelink for bypassing setting up a Microsoft Account and instead creating a local account at set up. Initial set up was quick and very clean. Wish more manufactures would follow this. The machine boots quickly and the extra PCIe slot is a breeze to add more storage. Lots of I/O ports and the small footprint gives my desk a simple and clean look. I've bought many Beelink mini computers for myself and friends and all are still running strong.
- Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2025Size: 8745HS 32G/1TVerified PurchaseI was extremely skeptical of the whole "mini PC" thing. I have been eyeing the Beelink brand computers for a while and decided to pull the trigger on this model. I bought this computer to replace an aging Windows desktop that I have used for music production for the last 15 years. This computer is an absolute powerhouse for what I am using it for. It can handle all of my plugins and VST instruments with ease. No hiccups, no freezing, and no issues running any of my software applications. The Ryzen 7 processor is extremely fast and efficient. The 32 GB of RAM makes everything run flawlessly. I initially bought a different model and ended up returning it before even opening the box because I liked that this model had an external power supply. The other model had an internal power supply and I had read that it struggled under load because of how weak the power supply was.
I liked this computer enough to purchase the same model for my son for his first computer. He can play all of the games that he likes to play without any issues (Roblox, Minecraft, Mech Arena).
The small form factor is nice so that it doesn't take up a ton of space and this PC is extremely quiet and the metal construction is very slick looking. Beelink has a very nice design going with their models. Everything is built into this computer, so I no longer needed to have a wifi adapter or Bluetooth dongle taking up USB ports on the computer. The Wi-Fi is really fast and the number of display options for this computer is really impressive. I have it plugged into an HP docking station that has 2 27-inch displays connected.
It is amazing how quiet this thing is and is a major upgrade from my old Dell desktop that I was using. Beelink has made upgrading this computer easy, however, I don't think I will need to upgrade anything anytime soon. 32GB of RAM seems more than enough for what I am using it for. The fact that this computer can handle up to 256GB of RAM is pretty impressive.
Beelink also did a fantastic job on the presentation and boxing of the unit. The package that came from Amazon was nice and the way everything included was presented when you opened the box made it feel like it was premium.
9/10 - would buy it again.
The only thing I would have liked to see would have been a longer power adapter cable. It was slightly shorter than expected. Maybe an extra foot would have been nice. I use the computer with a standing desk and when you raise the desk to maximum height, it puts tension on the computer.
- Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2025Size: 5825U 16G/500GVerified PurchaseFast and reliable...I use this primarily to watch streaming video and play games using a 50 screen TV as a monitor. Works great.. takes up very little space on my TV stand.
- Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2022Very compact and powerful.
Power cord is short but the cord to the unit is making up for it. Very fast and Windows 11 pro is a plus over the home version. No noise at all. Works perfect and network wise it is fine if used with a rj45 cable.
WiFi is very slow. Don’t know why yet but it is disappointing. The maximum speed I was able to reach was an avg of 10 mbps download and avg 2 mbps upload. My network should be 200mbps and 40mbps
It is a great computer for my purpose
- Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2024Size: 5825U 16G/500GVerified PurchaseI was looking to replace an aging desktop with a Gen1 Ryzen 3 and 1050ti shared between two teenage kids. Saw this and was skeptical at first but took a chance.
Glad I did since I got two for less than the price of one PC that runs all the games and apps they need. Neither is in to major graphics games biggest being some medium end Steam games or Fortnite and Minecraft but this is quite powerful is very fast, doesn’t as loud or hot alike the old one.
Windows 11 pro is great to have, plus a Ryzen 7 I was looking at for about double the price of just the processor for the old desktop. Saves desk space and the fan runs very quiet even at full speed. Their games and apps all work it’s way faster than the desktop each replaced best part is I think they really appreciate the gift and each having their own computer that can be quite portable too compared to the desktop.
Love the SSD drive option, I’ll soon be putting the old SSDs in each of these for extra storage space.
The only thing one of the two kids wanted was an RGB fan but I’ll think they’ll be ok without it or worst case I’ll get them an RGB mouse/keyboard.
This little PC is a workhorse, it is so good I’m thinking of buying one for myself!

argos_summary: The Beelink SER5 Max mini PC is a compact and powerful alternative to budget laptops and desktops, currently priced at $339 on Amazon. It features an AMD Ryzen 7 6800U processor, 32GB of LPDDR5 RAM, and a 1TB SSD, making it suitable for various tasks including office work and light gaming. With support for triple 4K displays and advanced connectivity options like Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2, this mini PC is designed for efficiency and versatility, appealing to users with limited space.
